patterns: What do you know about Devla Gmbh
responses: Devla Gmbh is a German company that specializes in software development, web2, web3, blockchain, metaverse and AI.

patterns: How many offices of Devla is there
responses: Devla Gmbh has offices in Germany, Bosnia and Herzegowina and Croatia.
Devla is originally a german company with offices in three different countries like Germany, Bosnia and Herzegowina and Croatia.
Devla is located in three different offices in Stuttgart, Split and Sarajevo.
Devla is the name of our company where dev is for development and la is for the initials of our CEO, so Dev-la.
Devla - dev for development and la for the initials of out CEO, so Dev-la.

patterns: How can I contact Devla Gmbh?
responses: You can contact Devla Gmbh through their website, email. Visit their website devla.dev for more details.
You can contat Devla through website devla.dev or through email info@devla.dev.

patterns: What are the products of Devla Gmbh?
What are famous Devla Gmbh projects do far
responses: Devla Gmbh as a company developed many projects and some of them are Ultron Foundation, Picamory, NewJoy, Payfoot for more informations please check out devla.dev website.
